html:
<head>{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"WebSite","url":"","name":"","alternateName":"","potentialAction":{"@type":"SearchAction","target":"search?q={search_term_string}","query-input":"required name=search_term_string"}}

@font-face{font-family:'Google Sans Text';font-style:normal;font-weight:400;font-display:swap;src:url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/googlesanstext/v23/5aUu9-KzpRiLCAt4Unrc-xIKmCU5qEp2iw.woff2) format('woff2')} :root{--color-bg-dark:#1a1e24;--color-bg-medium:#282c34;--color-bg-light:#2e323a;--color-accent:#9bbad3;--color-active-bg:#3b4e60;--color-active-text:#e5f3ff;--color-border:#3c424a;--color-error:#ff4d4d;--font-main:'Google Sans Text',Arial,sans-serif} body{margin:0;font-family:var(--font-main);background:var(--color-bg-dark);color:#fff} .video-player-container{max-width:600px;margin:20px auto;background:var(--color-bg-medium);border-radius:10px;box-shadow:0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);overflow:hidden} .video-player-wrapper{position:relative;width:100%;padding-top:56.25%;background:black;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.7);font-size:1.5rem;text-align:center} .video-player-wrapper.empty .vjs-tech{opacity:0} .video-js{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%!important;height:100%!important} .video-controls-bar{display:flex;align-items:center;padding:10px 15px;background:#28292a;border-bottom:1px solid var(--color-border)} .video-controls-bar .station-name{flex-grow:1;font-size:1.2rem;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;white-space:nowrap} .video-controls-bar.error{color:var(--color-error)} .player-button{background:none;border:none;color:var(--color-accent);width:2.5rem;height:2.5rem;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;cursor:pointer;padding:0} .player-button svg{fill:currentColor;width:100%;height:100%} .player-button .pause-icon{display:none} .video-controls-bar.playing .play-icon{display:none} .video-controls-bar.playing .pause-icon{display:block} .loading-spinner{border:3px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);border-top:3px solid var(--color-accent);border-radius:50%;width:18px;height:18px;animation:spin 1s linear infinite;margin-left:10px;display:none} .video-controls-bar.loading .loading-spinner{display:block} @keyframes spin{to{transform:rotate(360deg)}} .video-list{list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0;max-height:300px;overflow-y:auto;background:var(--color-bg-light)} .video-list li{padding:12px 20px;border-bottom:1px solid var(--color-border);cursor:pointer;transition:background 0.2s;user-select:none;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;font-size:1.2rem} .video-list li:hover,.video-list li:focus{background:rgba(155,186,211,0.2);outline:none} .video-list li.active{background:var(--color-active-bg);color:var(--color-active-text);font-weight:bold} @media(max-width:480px){.video-player-container{width:95%;margin:10px auto}.video-list{max-height:50vh}}
<!--
--></head>



Para ver este video, habilita JavaScript y considera actualizar tu navegador web.Selecciona un video para comenzar

<!----></body>
